org.pragmaticminds.crunch.serialization

Class JsonDeserializerWrapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pragmaticminds.crunch.serialization.JsonDeserializerWrapper<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.Deserializer<T>

    public class JsonDeserializerWrapper<T>
extends Object
implements org.apache.kafka.common.serialization.Deserializer<T>
    This class wraps a Deserializer into a Deserializer, so that it appears as the other kind.
    Author:
    Erwin Wagasow Created by Erwin Wagasow on 03.09.2018

        Parameters:
